Arkadaşla beraber oynanabilecek  müthiş oyunlardan. Oyun bitse  bile topluluk haritalarıyla kendini oynatmaya devam ediyor

It's an awesome game worth it's price. 
The story is fun and interesting, the portal gun works good (as expected) and the puzzles are fun to figure out.
I recommend this product.
It sometimes felt slow because of the repeating puzzles but as soon as I was getting bored it made a change.

8/10
Great, challenging single player story - co-op mode is also very good, although probably a bit easier
gave me headaches thru out the game 10/10
Игрушка интересная, заставляет задуматься, но в то же время она надоедает со временем. Ну а так, до фига шуточек и все вообщем довольно интересно)
Классная головоломка играл с другом понравилось

Игра тролет меня, твар, унижения 10/10, тиммейт 10/10, гемплей 10/10, баги есть.
Итог, игра гавно!!!
Great game, absolutely loved it. It is highly recommended.
Real fun playing workshop maps with friends!
Игра ну очень прикольная вот не могу оторваться с другом!

단점: 친구가 없으면 코옵을 못함. 그래서 코옵을 여태까지 못함

This game is challenging, but fun enough to not make you mad. After I finish a puzzle I would breathe a sigh of relief and hype myself up for the next one. Overall great game and so too is its predecessor.

Valve did a excellent game. Chell's story was not worse than first part.
If it's about multiplayer, then it's an excellent or terrible puzzle for you and your friend. You will not remain indifferent :)
顾得，就是联机经常有问题
НЕ МОГУ ПРОЙТИ ЭТУ 8 ГЛАВУ СУКК

I knew this game has to do something with portals and  puzzels.
It also has a fun (i can approve) online Coop-mode, where you can solves puzzles together with your friend.
I bought the game, because i wanted to play the Coop-Mode with a friend.

And i saw there is also a singleplayer-campaign, so i tried it out, and...
[b]HOLY SH**[/b]

[list]
    [*]really good, catching and funny story (i laughed, screamed and cried)
    [*]good sound and music
    [*]well working game mechanics
    [*]interesting puzzles and elements
    [*]every game feature makes sense 
    [*]even runs on my monsterous Laptop (Intel Core i7-3540M CPU @ 3.00GHz + Intel HD Graphics 4000)
    [*]you can kill your friend in Coop-Mode
[/list]
Сингл атмосферен, а кооператив с друзьями оставляет море впечатлений. Оба режима дополняют друг друга как нельзя кстати.
самая крутая игра по моему мнению! в неё я начал играть с 5 лет как помню. До сих пор играю и жизни радуюсь
Это самая крутая игра в которую я играл. Там есть всё головоломки, интересный сюжет, юмор. Жду 3-й части. :)

Definicja dobrego sequela (z Wikipedia, darmowa encyklopedia na pl.wikipedia.org)
Portal 2
游戏是好的，可我的眼睛就是不争气，单人推剧情时总是找不到路。
Very good and chill puzzle game. It's a very good sequel to the first game.
Just awesome, with nice learning curve
Great game to play with a friend!!
想出这种游戏的人简直就是tm的天才
oyunun hikayesi güzel karşılıklı sohbetler güzel bulmacalar güzel oyna yani bişe yok XD
Ein kurzes, interesantes, Rätsel basierendes Spiel. Wer sowas Spielen will. Soll es sich kaufen
Mind blowing game i have ever seen.
不错的游戏！如果有一个沙雕朋友将会更加快乐！

Absolutely great fun! I love it! Especially the ko-op mode is great! But I also liked the single-player story very much, good story, funny characters and great dark humor! My 7- and 11-year-old kids just began to play the ko-op mode and have big fun, too - of course the need a bit of help here and there. I can absolutely recommend to buy this game!
Great game, perfect for irritating your friends.
价格很低了，不错，挺有意思。
The game is extremely nice as well as very cheap

Absolutely love this game. Great mechanics, some puzzles still have me.thinking. I check player made levels once in a while and I am never disappointed. Had a lot of fun and I wish I could forget the story so that I can relive it.
Great game fun for hours, need good friends to actually be able to finish the coop without constantly killing each other
One the classic Valve games everyone should know about.  It's better than console because we got community made maps baby.  Highly recommend and is good for messing with your friends.

Best game i've played, have it on two different platforms its so good XD
Its a game that'll live on through the ages, just as its been doing for 8 years already.

100/10
Ein schönes Spiel mit einer Interessanten Story.
脑洞可以说是极其大了
協力プレイができるのでフレンドと楽しくプレイできます。
super gra na pewno  bardzo wciągająca

Well what is there left to say?
Pack your most beloved friend, take him out for a spin and them let him or her fall through portals like there is no tomorrow.
If this was played with virtual headset I believe players would be on the roller coaster thrill of their lives.

It's extremely fun, the challenges aka riddles are good and you do need to use your brain at times for sure.
Adding great fun in single player as well as your interactions with the A.I. are funny and made me giggle.
It's an all time classic this one so pick it up and bring a friend or buy 2.
Отличная игра с кучей багов которые мы юзали. Спасибо Валвы)
Спасибо Вальве за Портал белого  цвета Х|-го века
Me encanta, en mi opinion logro superar a su antecesor y me gusta su humor
